title: Crusader Kings 2 - Persian DLC Pack
description:
These Are The Two Persian DLC's Released By Paradox.

Persian Unit Pack DLC.
Persian Portrait Pack DLC.

Copy These 4 Files To Your DLC Folder Located In Your Crusader Kings II Folder.

If You Have The 3DM Version You Will Need To Add These Two Lines To Your DLC List In The 3DMGAME.ini File.

DLC042= 292980
DLC043= 292981

If You Have The Version With The Activator, Just Use The Activator 1-3 Times Like You've Done Before.

Don't Forget To Check The New DLC's At The Title Screen.
